service.title: AI Language Translator Service
service.description: This service helps user to translate sentence or query from one language to another. Both the languages are provided by user.

fields.lang1: What is the language to which you want from translate? This is always provided by user.
fields.lang2: What is the language to which you want to translate? This is always provided by user.
fields.sentence: This is always provided by user. Ask user when it is not provided in objective. This is sentence to be translated.
